statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ -1 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 10 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -16 \\ 13 \\ -12 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 0 \\ 6 \\ -24 \\ -30 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
